```{r, packages}
pkgs = c('plyr', 'dplyr','stringr','reshape2','tibble', 'DT','data.table',
         'limma')
for(pkg in pkgs){
    library(pkg, quietly=TRUE, verbose=FALSE, warn.conflicts=FALSE, 
            character.only=TRUE)
}
```
